name: Double Space Race: Arcade racing game in space
name_original: Double Space Race: Arcade racing game in space
description:
Great arcade racing game: Double Space Race. the best arcade game in space. Race against your friends in this amazing 2d one-tap space racing game.

Special Features
 Multiplayer! - show your space skills
 Challenge Friends - share your score online!
Achievements - Unlock new ships 
 Gameplay Statistics - climb the leader board and be the best

Double Space Race is completely free to play! You won't find a best way to explore the stars!

WHAT'S NEW
Hello Space racers! A big new galaxy of updates just for you:
• Multiplayer! 
• Custom Leaderboards
• Challenge Friends
• Achievements
• Gameplay Statistics
• Share Scores to Facebook and Twitter
• Encouraging Messages
• Clever Notifications
Thanks for you support and keep on giving us those amazing five stars rates!
